attributes.action: Revise the new junior doctor contract from 2016 to improve working conditions.
attributes.background: Junior doctors work in a demanding job all hours of day and night. They miss time with their families. They pay professional fees and have trained for many years, accruing thousands in debt. This contract represents a real-terms pay cut and an unreasonable definition of sociable hours. Rewrite it.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108782

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
